pages.text: Requirements: $(li)8 Crying Obsidian $(li)16 Obsidian $(li)4 Soul Fires
An example of how the ritual can be placed.

You've heard rumors of a powerful being that lurks within the Nether. Rumor has it that a cabal of Nether Cultists met with what a being they called an 'Apostle' in a circle of Obsidian where they appeared before them and told them secrets.

Perhaps, with some trickery, magic and a baiting material, you are capable of summoning one for your own purposes, though you shouldn't summon one within the Nether where they're at their most powerful. (Recommended Equipment: Enchanted Armor, Smite Weapons and Efficiency Pickaxe)
